title: 怎么关闭服务器热力膨胀的自动更新
author: Pandaeen

replies.author: Lizier
replies.txt_content:
服务端 config/cofh/core/common.cfg
打开 common.cfg 文件 找到

# Set to TRUE to be informed of non-critical updates. You will still receive critical update notifications.
B:EnableUpdateNotifications=true

将 true 改为 false
